labels.label:
INSERT INTO ORDER_TECH.landing_metrics (kafka_broker, topic_name, kafka_offset, retry_count, flow_start_time, status, flowfile_uuid, filename, kafka_key, kafka_partition, kafka_timestamp, processing_node )
VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

1 -> kafka_broker
2 -> kafka_topic
3 -> kafka_offset
4 -> retry_count
5 -> timestamp
6 -> status
7 -> uuid
8 -> filename
9 -> kafka_key
10 -> kafka_partition
11 -> kafka_timestamp
12 -> hostname

properties.putsql-sql-statement:
UPDATE ORDER_TECH.LANDING_METRICS
SET STATUS='SUCCESS' 
WHERE FLOWFILE_UUID = ?
